divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my back uncovered patio looking for ufos.It was almost completely dark.I was watching Venus start to set at 7:50 pm.I checked out about 3 airplanes with my 10x Zeiss.I looked almost straight up and saw what looked like Venus in size but moving toward north east straight line about speed of airplane,no sound.I got my binoculars on it still looked like single light like Venus now moving away from me right through Ursa Major.I backed up away my house roof outline blocked my view.I ran through my house to the front yard and glassed it again as it moved out of sight.Sometimes it appeared to slow down and then speed up again but I can't say for sure.I'm thinking maybe space station?It was a clear night and the event lasted 5 minutes or less.
Summary: object like Venus straight up moving about airplane speed that may have been variable.I used zIeiss 10x binoculars coming and going still just 1 light like Venus
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Sun City West
There were no other sightings in Sun City West on or around April 10th 2012
